attributes.action: Allow HM Forces travelling time in addition to leave time when travelling back from active service for R & R
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HM forces travelling back from active service areas on R&R now in many cases do so in their leave time. This can reduces their R & R time in the UK by three to four days. If HM Government  can not provide cover for R&R then their commitment of our armed forces should be reduced.
